title: Coast to Coast AM - Aug 08 2013 - The Millennium Project
description:
Date:	08-08-13
Host:	George Noory
Guests:	Jerome Glenn, Lauren Weinstein
News segment guests: Rosemary Ellen Guiley, Peter Davenport

Hour 1: Technology expert Lauren Weinstein talked about how Paypal is testing mobile payments using face verification.

Hours 2 & 3: Director of the Millennium Project, Jerome Glenn, discussed their annual 'State of the Future' reports which outline the challenges we face as a planet that is juggling technology, population, and the delicate balance of nature.

Hour 4: Open Lines related to the story about angelic intervention.
